headToApp: To access all the content you need to install our Mobile App. It contains 200 + exercises that help you work towards happiness and many of personal goals.
headToApp1: Instructions on how to access Mindshine have just been emailed to you, but you can also download the app directly with these links.
premiumText: There's nothing see in here right now. There's loads of interesting content in the blog and in the app.
howHappyAreYou: On average, how happy do you think you are?
startHere: Every journey starts somewhere. What’s your day-to-day happiness level?
chooseAnArea: Choose one area to begin with. You can explore others later.
practiceTime: When do you want to practice?
clearCommitment: Clear commitment increase the likelihood of reaching your goals. We’ll remind you.

whatsWorking: If we know what’s working, we can spread more happiness.
calculatingJourney: Just a moment. We are calculating your personal science-based journey to happiness...

unlimitiedRoutinesDesc: Get full access to all sessions, routines & courses that help you feeling happier.
moodTrackerDesc: Journal your mood regularly to become aware of your emotions & process them.
progrssInsightsDesc: Gain helpful insights about how you feel on a daily basis and log your progress.
mentalHealth: How would you rate your mental health?
timeAvailability: How much time do you have available to work on your mental health?
appriciationStep1: At Mindshine, we believe that happiness is a practice and that the mind can be trained just like a muscle.
appriciationStep1Message2: Whether you start slow or fast, our courses and routines are designed to get you ahead step by step.
appriciationStep2:
The more we know about your feelings, the easier it is to recommend the right courses and sessions.
  Mindshine is a holistic system, which tackles a range of issues from a multitude of angles.
   We use a viarity of exercises to retain your mind to serve you better.
  Click through to try some out.
appriciationStep3:
You just did you first check-in.
  Noticing and labeling your moods is a key part in managing your mental health, and Mindshine includes a daily mood tracking function to do just that.
appriciationStep4:
You just did your first Mindshine exercises. Many of them are as simple as that. 
Practicing gratitude is just one of the ways we can help you reprogram your mindset.
Tracking your mood and feelings is a crucial part of learning live happier.
needsWork: What would you like to work on?
resoneteWithYou: Do any of these phrases resonate with you?
statement1: “I am hard on myself when I feel like I failed or wasn’t able to fullfill my expectations.”
statement2: “I find it hard to notice and acknowledge small wins in my life.”
statement3: ”I find it easy to notice the small, good things around me.”
statement4: “I often feel like I’m not enough.”
howDoYouFeelDesc: “In a normal week, I mostly feel...
greatefulItems: Can you think of anything you’re grateful for right now?
greatefulItemsDesc: It doesn’t matter if it’s big or small, being conscious of the positive elements of our life helps build resilience.
writeHere: Don’t worry, everything you put into Mindshine is private.
enterPassword: Please enter a password for your account
name: Name
settingUp: Please wait a moment, while we setup your account.
weCanHelpYou: We are sure we can help you, just like we’ve helped over 500 000 Mindshiners who came before you.
rating1Heading: Didn’t know that I needed it
rating1Text: I thought I was a quiet resilient person, until a series of bad events happened and I really struggeled to process things. The way this app offers little exercises that are available at any time is really special and powerful, and I think everyone should have access to this type of help. It should be an essential app for everyone.
rating2Text: I love this app! It has everything I need to cultivate my happiness, from mindfulness exercises, to journaling, positive self-talk, and more. This is what the world needs!
rating3Text: I’m in an extremly stressful part of my life right now and I was kind of skeptical about this app. But honestly it’s really changing the way that I think and feel about my situation and myself/feelings. For the first time in my life, I feel confident and I like who I am.
autumSale: HALF PRICE IN THE AUTUMN SALE
aboutText1: The Mindshine App contains more than 200 exercises and sessions to help you improve your mental health.
aboutText2: Arranged by goal, length or category, the exercises will help you build confidence, combat stress, manage anxiety and much more.
aboutText3: Mindshine has already helped more than 500, 000 people, and if you aren’t satisfied, we offer a 14 day money back guarantee.
mindshineGuidedCoaching: Mindshine guided coaching helps you overcome the key difficulties standing between you and improved mental health.
seriesOfExercises: We have developed a series of exercises and courses that help you improve upon the root causes of unhappiness.
takeQuestionnaire: Take the questionnaire to help you better understand what areas of your mental health could be improved first.
scienceText: We have adapted techniques from the world of psychology and neuroscience to fit into short, audio-guided sessions.
tailoredText: Our sessions are based around your goals. With Mindshine, you choose the destination, and we recommend the path.
actionableText: Our powerful coaching plans are simple, fun, and come in bite-sized daily chunks that fit your schedule.
